definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: We have been delighted to host high-profile visitors from Purdue University and Oxford University in recent weeks.
sentences.chinese: 我們很高興在近幾周迎來了來自普渡大學的重要客人。

sentences.english: The  climate model simulations were generated and analyzed at Purdue University.
sentences.chinese: 天氣模式模擬數據是由美國普渡大學生成和分析的。
